definition: according to belief/it is believed that
according to/to act in accordance with/to depend on/to seize/to occupy
letter/mail/CL:封[feng1]/to trust/to believe/to profess faith in/truthful/confidence/trust/at will/at random

sentences.english: Peppermint leaves are believed to relieve tiredness and nasal stuffiness.
sentences.chinese: 据信薄荷叶可以减轻疲劳和鼻塞。

sentences.english: Much of the rest is believed to be going into stock markets around the world.
sentences.chinese: 剩下的那五成，据信是流入了全球各地的股市。

sentences.english: It's said she’d been trapped in her kitchen with her grandson for nine days.
sentences.chinese: 据信，她和自己的孙子被困在厨房中长达九天的时间。

sentences.english: It is believed that the decoding of these earlier forms is only a matter of time.
sentences.chinese: 据信，陶符文字的释读仅仅是一个时间问题。

sentences.english: Some 200 more are believed to be awaiting approval.
sentences.chinese: 据信，还有大约200家机构正等待审批。

sentences.english: The fugitive is believed to be headed for the Canadian border.
sentences.chinese: 据信，逃亡者正向加拿大边界方向逃窜。

sentences.english: This tradition is also believed to come from the Thracians who may have danced similarly during Dionysian rituals.
sentences.chinese: 这项传统据信是出自色雷斯人酒神节中类似的舞蹈。

sentences.english: The Mongol warlord Genghis Khan is famously believed to have fathered hundreds of children in the lands he conquered.
sentences.chinese: 蒙古王成吉思汗据信在他征服之处有数百个孩子。

sentences.english: The surface-to-surface missile is believed to have a range of some 2, 000 kilometers.
sentences.chinese: 据信这种地对地导弹的射程为两千多公里。

sentences.english: He is believed to have been executed with an antiaircraft gun.
sentences.chinese: 据信玄永哲是被用高射炮处决。

sentences.english: An unknown number of personnels are still trapped under the debris.
sentences.chinese: 据信还有数目不详的人员被困在瓦砾下。

sentences.english: Imes obtained the edge and was held sure to win in the election.
sentences.chinese: 艾姆斯取得了优势，据信必将在选举中获胜。

sentences.english: It is believed that China is still building Mings, with 21 delivered so far.
sentences.chinese: 据信中国仍在制造明级，至今也移交了21艘。

sentences.english: As many as 100, 000 people are believed to have died in Sri Lanka's 25-year civil war.
sentences.chinese: 据信在这25年中大约有10万人死于斯里兰卡内战。

sentences.english: Long-running disputes over land are thought to underlie many of the clashes.
sentences.chinese: 据信关于土地问题由来以久的争议也引发了许多冲突。

sentences.english: Guzmán is believed to be hiding in the Sierra Madre mountains.
sentences.chinese: 古兹曼据信藏身于马德雷山中。

definition: it is said/allegedly/according to reports/or so they say
according to a report/It is reported that...
Boko Haram, Islamic insurgent group in north Nigeria

pinyin: Yi1 si1 lan2 Sheng4 zhan4 Zu3 zhi1

definition: Abu Sayyaf, militant Islamist separatist group also known as al-Harakat al-Islamiyya

pinyin: Jian3 shi4 fang2 wu4 zhou1 kan1

definition: to quote/to cite/to recommend (one's friend's, associates etc)
